subject: Cricket (Game)
Appointments and Executive Changes
organizations: Board of Control for Cricket in India
lead_paragraph: The Board of Control for Cricket in India, the sport’s governing body there, toppled Narayanaswami Srinivasan from the helm of the International Cricket Council.
snippet: The Board of Control for Cricket in India, the sport’s governing body there, toppled Narayanaswami Srinivasan from the helm of the International Cricket Council.
